item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to hacksec We develop tools and software for making pentesting easy and securing your network. Founded in 2021 by script1337, We hope you enjoy our products as much as we enjoy offering them to you. If you have any questions or comments, please donâ€™t hesitate to contact us.
